extendedInfo.description: NewsHunt, India's #1 mobile newspaper app brings together the News from 80+ regional newspapers in 11 languages, and the best Jobs from India.âNewsHunt : India News | Jobs' is free and is used every day by millions of users around the world. - Recipient of GSMA Mobile Awards 2013 for Best Mobile Publishing Product- Number 1 News App on Google Play in the free âNews & Magazinesâ category on Google Play- India's Best News App & in top 10 smartphone consumed apps across all platforms by Neilsen Consumer Rankingsâ¨- Named the âMost Downloaded News Appâ, by GetJar.com with over 8 million downloads to dateâ¨- Users spend more time on NewsHunt than on YouTube, according to a report by Nielsen Informate Mobile InsightsNews Features: â¢	Read News from 85 national & regional Newspapers, Websites & other News sourcesâ¢       Home screen widget that shows latest news stories from recently read Newspapers. â¢	Read News in English & 10 Indian languages, even if your phone doesnât support the language & font. Available in Hindi, Malayalam, Tamil, Telugu, Kannada, Bengali, Marathi, Gujarati, Punjabi & Oriyaâ¢	Get Local News from over 600 Indian districts & towns, plus Cricket scores, weather, horoscopes, stock updates & classifiedsâ¢	Get Alerts & Notifications of Breaking News even when youâre not using the appâ¢	Partners: The Hindu, Hindustan Times, The Indian Express, Mid-Day, Dainik Jagran, Dainik Bhaskar, Malayala Manorama, Dinakaran, Dinamalar, Eenadu, Sakshi, Ananda Bazaar Patrika, Deccan Herald, Sakaal, Divya Bhaskar, Jagbani, India Today, BBC (Hindi), IBNLive.com & moreâ¢	Share News over SMS, Email & Facebook*Find your next Job on âNewsHunt : India News | Jobs'*Now, âNewsHunt : India News | Jobs' lets you stay on top of the best Job opportunities that suit you, in one simple Job search experience! Combining over 1 lakh Job postings from India's best Job portals, Naukri.com & Monsterindia.com, the app makes the process of finding a Job simple & fast. Jobs Features: â¢	Search for Jobs by keywords, location & industry type or browse by categoryâ¢	Find Jobs and read detailed Job descriptions without leaving the appâ¢	Save the Jobs you like, to read & apply to laterâ¢	Apply to Jobs directly from your mobileâ¢	Create your profile & let the app search for matching Jobs, even when you're not using the appâ¢	Get one-touch access to your most recent Job searches, without having to type your search query againDo enjoy reading your favourite newspapers & looking for Jobs on âNewsHunt : India News | Jobs'. To report any issues with usage or just to share feedback and tell us how we can improve, write to support@eternoinfotech.com Keywords: NewsHunt, India Newspapers on Mobile, Mobile Indian Newspaper, Mobile Newspaper, India, Hindi, Bengali, Marathi, Gujarati, Punjabi, Kannada, Tamil, Telugu, Oriya, Malayalam, English, News, Photo Gallery, Movie Reviews, Cricket, Horoscope, GPRS, Read Newspapers, Cricket, Scores, Live Scores, ODI, Test Match, Politics, Religion, Games, Lifestyle, Photo Gallery, Bollywood News, Recipes, Health, Breaking News, Cinema, Classifieds, Business, Careers, Magazines, Lifestyle, Economy, Politics, Jobs, Find Jobs, Job Search, Job Portals, Job Sites, Naukri.com, Monster, Monsterindia.com, Naukri, Apply, Recruitment, Recruiters, IT, BPO, Call Centre, Freshers, Trainee, Finance, Sales, Marketing, Management, Software, Wi-Fi, 3G, 2G, airtel, Vodafone, Idea, BSNL, Reliance, New Delhi, Andhra Pradesh, Karnataka, Tamil Nadu, Kerala, Maharashtra, Madhya Pradesh, Uttar Pradesh, Gujarat, Punjab, Haryana, Kashmir, Bengal, Jharkhand, Bangladesh

reviews.title: Are you testing ?
reviews.comment: Guys, I was a Newshunt fan. But now I don\'t think you guys are testing it. Oneindia news are not coming properly. Just the first para of news is coming after oneindia web layout change. Listview of articles are lagging frequently. Notification of new shunt is a joke. Present the notifications in English or in regional language of selection. Don\'t bring it in tanglish ( tamil written in english) One star to get your attention. Fix it to get 5 stars again - A devastated Newshunt fan waiting for your response.
